title: Holding Russia to Account (with Crispin Blunt MP)
itunes:title: Holding Russia to Account (with Crispin Blunt MP)
description:
Conservative MP Crispin Blunt says the U.K. has effectively committed to being the arsenal for Ukrainians. He also tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker that his Conservative colleague coming out as trans is a seminal moment.

Plus, Professor Phil Hubbard from King's College London discusses his new book 'Borderland: Identity and Belonging at the Edge of England,' about Kent's central part in Britain's discourse about Brexit, the pandemic and migration.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
